titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid to the Classes of 1951-1960 records CA.MS.01024
titlestmt.author: Madison White

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2018-10-24 14:14:44 -0400.

change.item: Finding aids for each class records were combined into this meta record, with additions from recent accessions

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for use without restriction beyond the standard terms and conditions of Smith College Special Collections.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Whenever donation information for a particular set of material is known, it is included in the finding aid below. However, a majority of the material was not formally accessioned and its origins are not currently known.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection brings together ten record groups that are arranged chronologically, one per graduating class. However, since some materials are placed in a class record group based on when they were created, and not by whom, materials relelvant to a class may exist in more than one series.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Please use the following format when citing materials from this collection:
Classes of 1951-1960 records, Box #, Smith College Archives, Northampton, Massachusetts.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Individual biographical files are also available, and often include photographs, photo albums, newspaper clippings, letters and correspondences, and class notes. These files, which are organized by class and are housed in the boxes numbered immnediately after each set of Class Records are not currently listed in any finding aid; contact Special Collections for more information.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Classes of 1951-1960 records consist of individual class notes, examinations, papers and class letters, correspondence, photographs, scrapbooks, songbooks as well as reunion materials of the same nature, all related to or dating from the time periods during which these classes were students at Smith College.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Materials in this collection may be governed by copyright. For reproductions of materials that are governed by fair use as defined under U. S. Copyright Law, no permission to cite or publish is required. Researchers are responsible for determining who may hold materials' copyrights and obtaining approval from them. Researchers do not need anything further from Smith College Special Collections to move forward with their use.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Class of 1951 was the seventy-third graduating class of Smith College.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The Class of 1951 records were processed by Tiffany Tawzer in 2006.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Please use the following format when citing materials from this record group: Class of 1951 records, Box #, Smith College Archives, Northampton, Massachusetts.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Class of 1951 Records, contain materials describing the history and activities of the Class of 1951, including materials from commencement, reunions, and other important events. Types of materials include photographs, invitations, songs, newspaper clippings, programs, letters, and other memorabilia.
Individual biographical files are also available, and often include photographs, photo albums, newspaper clippings, letters and correspondences, and class notes.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Class of 1952 was the seventy-fourth graduating class of Smith College.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Class of 1952 Records contain materials describing the history and activities of the Class of 1952, including materials from commencement, reunions, senior dramatics, and other important events. Types of materials include photographs, invitations, songs, newspaper clippings, programs, letters, and other memorabilia.
Individual biographical files are also available, and often include photographs, photo albums, newspaper clippings, letters and correspondences, and class notes.

did.unittitle: Daughters of Smith Alums Enrolled at Smith

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Class of 1954 records contain materials describing the history and activities of the Class of 1954, including materials from commencement, reunions, dramatics, and other important events. Types of materials include photographs, invitations, songs, newspaper clippings, programs, letters, extensive correspondences, questionnaires, financial information, and other memorabilia.
Individual biographical files are also available, and often include photographs, photo albums, newspaper clippings, letters and correspondences, and class notes.
